3: You think... So, what electronic device did you want to interfere?
From Liv's calculations just now, I saw that there was a huge uncorrupted mechanoid right beneath us.
I'm guessing it's one of the guards here, but it was bound by some electromagnetic device for some reason.
What we just did was releasing it.
When it starts fighting with those pesky Corrupted...
We can just slip past them!
There's a chance that it'll attack us as well, so are we willing to take a gamble here?
It's already starting to fight with the Corrupted!
Let's go, go, go! We'll slip down through the crack here and tail it!
